description: [Ferocious](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0679) has the ability to add a Class ID in the current user Registry hive to enable persistence mechanisms.(Citation: Kaspersky WIRTE November 2021)

external_references.description: Yamout, M. (2021, November 29). WIRTE’s campaign in the Middle East ‘living off the land’ since at least 2019. Retrieved February 1, 2022.
